Name:
* Dong Fangxiao CHN disqualified from the competition. In 2010 the International Gymnastics Federation found out that Dong was only 14 years old in 2000 - too young to compete at the Sydney Olympics. 




Women's Balance beam - Gymnastics - Sydney 2000 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     First step in the gymnastics competition was a qualifying round in which all entrants performed optional exercises on all apparatuses. The eight highest scoring gymnasts on each apparatus qualified to the final for the apparatus. Only two gymnasts from any country could advance to the final. In the final the gymnasts performed an optional exercise on the apparatus. The final scoring for each gymnast was the points scored in the final, as the qualifying scores were not carried over. Event facts: Women's Balance beam competition was held at the Sydney SuperDome, Olympic Park and 84 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Women's Balance beam - Sydney 2000 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
